A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class Background
Determines the response given when each of the buttons on the game board is pressed, each of the directional buttons will move the active squirrel, while selecting a gridbutton that shows the head of a squirrel will make it into the active squirrel.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class LevelSelect
Determines the response given when each of the buttons is pressed, each of the three buttons will create a respective level in the game.
addBlackSquirrel(Squirrel) - Method in class Background
 
addBrownSquirrel(Squirrel) - Method in class Background
 
addGreySquirrel(Squirrel) - Method in class Background
 
addRedSquirrel(Squirrel) - Method in class Background
Takes a squirrel object as a parameter and adds it to the active squirrels on the board only one of each colour squirrel is allowed and the colour is determined by which method is called.

B

Background - Class in <Unnamed>
This class represents the board in the game, It's main purpose is to build a gui which can be used to move the squirrels that have been placed on the board.
Background() - Constructor for class Background
Constructor.

C

CaseNoisettes - Class in <Unnamed>
The main function runs the main menu from which users may then select a level to challenge.
CaseNoisettes() - Constructor for class CaseNoisettes
 
checkCleared() - Method in class Background
Checks if every active squirrel has dropped it's nut in one of the holes on the board, returning a boolean which determines whether the game has been cleared.
createFlower(int) - Method in class Background
Used to create a hole-blocking flower at the specified location.

G

getBackground() - Method in class Background
Provides this object to the function to be used in other classes.
getColour() - Method in class Squirrel
Returns the colour of this squirrel.
getFilename() - Method in class Picture
Determines the filename associated with this Picture.
getFilledHoles() - Method in class Background
Returns an array of the filled holes on this game board.
getflowerLocation() - Method in class Background
Getter function which returns the location of the hole-blocking flower
getgridButton() - Method in class Background
Provides the array of gridbuttons to another function.
getheadLocation() - Method in class Squirrel
Returns the index in the array of grid buttons which points to the head of this squirrel.
getLFlowerLocation(int) - Method in class Squirrel
Calculates, for the Black and Brown squirrels which are both L shaped, the index of the location of their added flowers using the location of the head of said squirrel as a parameter.
getnutStatus() - Method in class Squirrel
Returns whether or not his squirrel is currently holding a nut.
getObstacles() - Method in class Background
Creates a list of all the active obstacles on the board, obstacles are given specific indexes so that they may be referenced individually at other points.
getRotation() - Method in class Picture
* Determines the rotation applied to this Picture, in degrees.
getSquirrelRotation() - Method in class Squirrel
Returns the rotation in degrees of this squirrel as it was constructed.
gettailLocation(int, int) - Method in class Squirrel
Calculates the index of the location of the tail of a squirrel, taking the position of the head of the squirrel and the rotation of the squirrel as parameters.

S

setBlank() - Method in class Squirrel
Changes the Icon of the gributton which is currently occupied by the parts of the squirrel.
setFilledHoles(Integer) - Method in class Background
A function which takes as a parameter the index of a gridbutton that has just had a nut been slotted into its hole, This function will then add the location of that filled hole to an array which stores what holes are filled and which squirrel filled that hole.
setSquirrel(Squirrel) - Method in class Background
Sets the clicked squirrel as the 'active' squirrel to be moved by the directional buttons.
Squirrel - Class in <Unnamed>
This class represents a Squirrel object that users may interact with in the game.
